title: Create agent/harness/generic/ package
description: GenericHarness as a proper Harness implementation. Owns internal outputcollector.Collector. HandleOutput() feeds collector. Start() blocks, bridging collector StateCh to events channel until ctx cancelled (same semantics as Claude/Codex). BuildCommandArgs, BuildCommandEnvVars, EnsureConfigDir, PrepareForLaunch, HandleHookEvent are no-ops. Constructor takes HarnessConfig (reads Command field).
